hero.text: I'm <guidelines>Full-stack</guidelines> developer and Architect with <guidelines>4</guidelines> years experience.

about.text: I possess four years of valuable software development experience. I am dedicated to crafting products and services that resonate with diverse audiences, reaching individuals at various levels through outreach and program initiatives. Problem-solving is not just a job requirement for me; it's a passion. Outside of work, I indulge in snowboarding during the winter and bowling in the summer, finding joy in these activities.
